1.title: Meet The Wizard
1.description: You received a letter from the local wizard. He claims to have information regarding the old community center.

2.title: The Mysterious Qi
2.objective: Leave a rainbow shell in the box at the train platform.
2.description: Within a secret lock-box, you found a note with peculiar instructions. It's signed by a 'Mr. Qi'.

3.title: The Mysterious Qi
3.objective: Place 10 beets inside Mayor Lewis' fridge.
3.description: You've found another note written by 'Mr. Qi'. The request is even more unusual this time.

4.title: The Mysterious Qi
4.objective: Give the sand dragon his final meal.
4.description: You've found yet another strange note within the Mayor's fridge. This time, the instructions are more cryptic.

5.title: The Mysterious Qi
5.objective: Inspect the lumber pile beside your house.
5.description: You found another note in the sand dragon's eye. It seems Mr. Qi's strange scavenger hunt has come to an end.

6.title: Getting Started
6.description: If you want to become a farmer, you have to start with the basics. Use your hoe to till the soil, then use a seed packet on the tilled soil to sow a crop. Water every day until the crop is ready for harvest.

7.title: Raising Animals
7.description: Robin, the local carpenter, lives north of town. In exchange for raw materialsand money, she'll construct new buildings on your farm. You'll need her to build a coop orbarn so that you can raise animals.

8.title: Advancement
8.objective: Reach Farming level 1 and craft a scarecrow.
8.description: As you gain experience, you'll discover new crafting recipes to increaseprofit and make life easier. A scarecrow, for example, will prevent crows from snacking onyour precious crops.

9.title: Introductions
9.objective: Go talk to every villagers in town
9.description: It would be a nice gesture to introduce yourself around town. Some people might be anxious to meet the new farmer.

10.title: Copper Ore
10.objective: Bring a piece of copper ore to Clint's blacksmith shop.
10.description: You found a piece of copper ore. You're not sure what you can use it for, but the local blacksmith ought to know.

11.title: Forging ahead
11.description: If you're going to keep mining, you should build a furnace.

12.title: Smelting
12.objective: Use your furnace to smelt a Copper Bar.
12.description: Now that you've built a furnace, you can smelt some metal. According to Clint's instructions, if you place 5 copper ore and 1 piece of coal in the furnace, it should produce a copper bar.

13.title: To The Beach
13.description: Someone named Willy invited you to visit the beach south of town. He says he has something to give you.
13.objective: Visit the beach south of town before 5:00 pm.

14.title: Explore The Mine
14.description: There's an old mine shaft in the mountains north of town. There could be valuable minerals inside, but Marlon hinted that it might be dangerous.

15.title: Initiation
15.description: If you can slay 10 slimes, you'll have earned your place in the Adventurer's Guild.

16.title: Initiation
16.description: You successfully dispatched 10 slimes. Now you can enter the Adventurer's Guild.

17.title: Deeper In The Mine
17.description: It seems that the mine elevator is still functional. It will allow you to quickly return to any elevator doors you've discovered. A deeper expedition might be in order.

18.title: To The Bottom?
18.description: So far, there's no sign of the bottom. How low does it go?
18.objective: Reach the bottom of the mine.

19.title: The Skull Key
19.description: You found a strange looking key in the bottom of the mines.
19.objective: Discover the purpose of the Skull Key.

20.title: Qi's Challenge
20.description: You've been challenged to reach level 25 in the skull cavern. You've been promised a substantial reward if you're successful.
20.objective: Reach level 25 in the Skull Cavern.

21.title: Marnie's Request
21.description: Marnie came by the farm and asked if you'd bring her a cave carrot. She's trying to train her goats to speak, and cave carrot is their favorite snack.
21.objective: Bring a Cave Carrot into Marnie's shop.

22.title: Fish Casserole
22.description: Jodi swung by the farm to ask you to dinner at 7:00 PM. Her only request was that you bring a largemouth bass for her fish casserole.
22.objective: Enter Jodi's house with a largemouth bass at 7:00 PM.

23.title: Archaeology
23.description: You found an ancient-looking object. Could it be some kind of artifact from long ago? Perhaps Gunther, curator of the local museum, has the answer.

24.title: Archaeology
24.description: Gunther asked if you'd consider donating any new artifacts or minerals you find to the museum. He says he'll compensate you by way of occasional rare goods.
24.objective: Donate an artifact or a mineral to the museum.

25.title: How To Win Friends
25.description: Giving gifts is a great way to build friendships. Learn each person's individual tastes and you'll be popular in no time.

26.title: Rat Problem
26.description: There's something odd going on in the Community Center...

27.title: Goblin Problem
27.description: There's a goblin blocking the path to the Witch's hut. There must be some way to get him to move... Perhaps I should seek out more information on Goblins.
27.objective: Gain entrance to the Witch's hut.

28.title: Dark Talisman
28.description: The Wizard asked me to retrieve the magic ink from his ex-wife's house... but to gain access I'll need a dark talisman.
28.objective: Enter the sewer and ask Krobus about the dark talisman.

100.title: Robin's Lost Axe
100.description: Robin lost her favorite axe. The last time she remembers using it, she was cutting wood south of Marnie's ranch.

101.title: Jodi's Request
101.description: Jodi needs a fresh cauliflower for a recipe she's making. She's asking you to bring her one.

102.title: Mayor's shorts
102.description: Mayor Lewis has lost his purple *shorts*. He's asking you to find and return them... Discreetly.
102.objective: Find and return Mayor Lewis' purple shorts.

103.title: Pam Is Thirsty
103.description: Pam is hankerin' for a pale ale. Regular old beer won't do. You can brew one yourself if you have hops and a keg.

104.title: Crop Research
104.description: Demetrius needs a fresh melon for his research.

105.title: Knee Therapy
105.description: George needs a hot pepper to soothe his aching knee.

106.title: Cow's Delight
106.description: Marnie wants to give her cows a special treat. She's asking for a single bunch of amaranth.
106.objective: Bring Marnie one bunch of amaranth.

107.title: Blackberry Basket
107.description: It's blackberry season, but Linus can't find his basket! He's asking you to help him find it. He has no idea where it is.
107.objective: Find Linus' basket and return it to him.

108.title: Carving Pumpkins
108.description: Caroline wants to carve a pumpkin with her daughter. She asked you to bring her one from the farm.

109.title: Catch A Squid
109.description: Willy is challenging you to catch a squid. He says you can fish them from the ocean on winter nights.

110.title: Clint's Attempt
110.description: Clint wants you to give Emily an amethyst. He wants you to tell her it's from him.

111.title: A Dark Reagent
111.description: The wizard wants you to descend into the mines and fetch him a Void Essence. He needs it for some kind of dark magic.

112.title: A Favor For Clint
112.description: Clint got a new hammer and he wants to test it out on a variety of metals.

113.title: Robin's Request
113.description: Robin wrote to you asking for some hardwood.

114.title: Fish Stew
114.description: Gus wants to make fish stew, but he needs an albacore.

115.title: Fresh Fruit
115.description: Emily wants a taste of spring. She's asking for a fresh apricot.

116.title: Granny's Gift
116.description: Evelyn wants to surprise her husband with a gift.

117.title: Pierre's Notice
117.description: Pierre will pay *top coin* to whoever brings him a plate of sashimi. Apparently he's really craving the stuff.

118.title: Aquatic Research
118.description: Demetrius is studying the toxin levels of the local pufferfish. He'd like you to bring him one.

119.title: A Soldier's Star
119.description: Kent wants to give his wife a starfruit for their anniversary.

120.title: Mayor's Need
120.description: Mayor Lewis wants truffle oil. He won't explain what it's for. Maybe it's none of your business.
120.objective: Bring Lewis a bottle of Truffle Oil.

121.title: Wanted: Lobster
121.description: Gus put out a notice requesting a fresh lobster.

122.title: Pam Needs Juice
122.description: Pam's TV Remote is dead. She's having a tough time going back and forth between the couch and the TV dial.

123.title: Staff Of Power
123.description: The Wizard is creating a staff of phenomenal power. Who knows what it's for. He needs an iridium bar to finish it.

124.title: Catch a Lingcod
124.description: Willy is challenging you to catch a Lingcod.

125.title: Exotic Spirits
125.description: Gus wants to make a Coco-no-no, but he's missing the main ingredient.

126.title: Errand for your Wife
126.description: Your wife asked you to bring her 200 pieces of fiber for a secret project.

127.title: Haley's Cake-Walk
127.description: Your wife is organizing a charity cake-walk in the town square. She asked you to bring a chocolate cake.
127.objective: Enter Town on a sunny morning with a chocolate cake.

131.title: Willy's Challenge
131.description: Willy has challenged you to catch 3 Sandfish.

133.title: Feeding Animals
133.description: Robin, the local carpenter, lives north of town. In exchange for raw materials and money, she'll construct new buildings on your farm. If you build a silo, you can start harvesting your own grass with the scythe, and store it to feed your animals.

29.title: Strange Note
29.description: You found a note, barely legible, asking you to bring *may-pal serrup* to the *seecrit wuds*./Bring *may-pal serrup* to the *seecrit wuds*
29.objective: Bring maple syrup to the Secret Woods

30.title: Cryptic Note
30.description: You found a note that reads, *Someone is waiting for you on level 100 in the Skull Cavern*
30.objective: Reach level 100 in the Skull Cavern

31.title: A Winter Mystery
31.description: You encountered a suspicious looking figure by the bus stop. When it saw you, it fled toward town. Could there be a clue to its whereabouts?

130.title: The Pirate's Wife
130.description: An old lady living on Ginger Island is asking you to find a keepsake of her husband's. She gave you an old photograph of a soldier that washed up on shore, hoping it would help in some way.
130.objective: Find a keepsake that belonged to Birdie's husband.

132.title: Getting Started
132.description: If you want to become a farmer, you have to start with the basics. Feed your chickens each day by letting them eat grass outside, or by placing hay into their troughs. Once they are mature, harvest an egg!
132.objective: Harvest an egg from your chickens.

134.title: The Giant Stump
134.description: The big tree to the south of my farm blew down. With 100 hardwood, I could turn the stump into something interesting...
